input: The concert was canceled due to inclement weather. Ticket holders will be refunded in full. We apologize for any inconvenience.
output:
When the concert was canceled, it happened because of bad conditions like stormy or wet. People who bought tickets will get their money back completely, which is in full. I'm sorry to say that this might cause trouble for some folks; we are taking responsibility.
